content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position(-15.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(-15.0, -49.0) which is actively working to produce iron plates from iron ore.

### Coal Mining and Storage System at position(40.0, -84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(40.0, -84.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden chest at position(40.5, -82.5) storing extracted coal.
- Wooden chest at position(41.5, -83.5) for additional storage.
- Burner inserter at position(54.5, -83.5) transferring items from the chest at position(56.5, -83.5).

### Iron Plate Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner inserter at position(41.5, -80.5) ready to transfer items.
- Wooden chest at position(56.5, -83.5) storing iron plates.

### Conveyor Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group working with coal inventory of 5, facilitating the movement of resources.
- Belts connecting various positions to streamline the transfer of items.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors due to full storage
- Regularly check and empty storage chests to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full storage.
